import React, { useState, useCallback, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useNavigate, useLocation, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useManufacturing } from '../context/ManufacturingContext'; const ManufacturingOrdersInterface = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const location = useLocation(); const { id } = useParams(); const { manufacturingOrders, addOrder, updateOrder, deleteOrder, getOrderById } = useManufacturing(); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [viewMode, setViewMode] = useState('list'); const [activeFilter, setActiveFilter] = useState('all'); const [filterType, setFilterType] = useState('all'); const [voiceListening, setVoiceListening] = useState(false); const [showForm, setShowForm] = useState(false); const [selectedOrder, setSelectedOrder] = useState(null); // Form data for creating/editing orders const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ reference: '', finishedProduct: '', quantity: '', unit: 'pcs', scheduleDate: '', status: 'Draft', billOfMaterial: '', priority: 'Medium', assignee: null, components: [], workOrders: [] }); // Handle route parameter changes useEffect(() => { if (id === 'new') { setShowForm(true); setSelectedOrder(null); setFormData({ reference: `MO-${Date.now()}`, finishedProduct: '', quantity: '', unit: 'pcs', scheduleDate: '', status: 'Draft', billOfMaterial: '', priority: 'Medium', assignee: null, components: [], workOrders: [] }); } else if (id) { const order = getOrderById(id); if (order) { setSelectedOrder(order); setFormData(order); setShowForm(true); } } else { setShowForm(false); setSelectedOrder(null); } }, [id, getOrderById]); // Real-time search implementation following memory requirements const filteredOrders = useCallback(() => { const searchLower = searchTerm.toLowerCase(); return manufacturingOrders.filter(order => { return ( order.id.toLowerCase().includes(searchLower) || order.finishedProduct.toLowerCase().includes(searchLower) || order.status.toLowerCase().includes(searchLower) ); }); }, [manufacturingOrders, searchTerm]); const handleFilterChange = useCallback((filter, type) => { setActiveFilter(filter); setFilterType(type); }, []); const orders = filteredOrders(); return (

); }; export default ManufacturingOrdersInterface;
